title: Cholesterol Screening
content: A cholesterol screening measures the level of cholesterol in your blood. High cholesterol increases the risk of heart disease. It's recommended for adults every 4-6 years.

title: Blood Pressure Check
content: Regular blood pressure checks help monitor your cardiovascular health. Ideal blood pressure is typically around 120/80 mm Hg. Consult your doctor for personalized advice.

title: Vitamin D Test
content: Vitamin D is crucial for bone health. A blood test can measure your vitamin D levels. Low levels may indicate a need for supplements or dietary changes.

title: Vision Screening
content: Regular eye exams help detect vision problems and eye diseases. Adults should have an eye exam every 2 years, or as recommended by an eye care professional.
